issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement metrics in join operator
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11052](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11052). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement metrics in join operator to make it easier to debug performance issues.

comments.body:
